members.name: generate
members.content:
Use this function when SSG should be generated from another module, such as a Vite plugin. This function's should be passed the paths of the entry module and Qwik Router Plan. ```typescript export declare function generate(opts: SsgOptions): Promise; ```
Parameter Type Description
opts [SsgOptions](#staticgenerateoptions)
**Returns:** Promise<[SsgResult](#staticgenerateresult)>

members.name: SsgRenderOptions
members.content:
```typescript export interface SsgRenderOptions extends RenderOptions ``` **Extends:** RenderOptions
Property Modifiers Type Description
[emit404Pages?](./router.ssgrenderoptions.emit404pages.md) boolean _(Optional)_ Set to `false` if the static build should not write custom or default `404.html` pages. Defaults to `true`.
[emitData?](./router.ssgrenderoptions.emitdata.md) boolean _(Optional)_ Set to `false` if the generated `q-data.json` data files should not be written to disk. Defaults to `true`.
[emitHtml?](./router.ssgrenderoptions.emithtml.md) boolean _(Optional)_ Set to `false` if the generated static HTML files should not be written to disk. Setting to `false` is useful if the SSG should only write the `q-data.json` files to disk. Defaults to `true`.
[exclude?](./router.ssgrenderoptions.exclude.md) string\[\] _(Optional)_ Defines file system routes relative to the source `routes` directory that should not be static generated. Accepts wildcard behavior. This should not include the "base" pathname. `exclude` always takes priority over `include`.
[include?](./router.ssgrenderoptions.include.md) string\[\] _(Optional)_ Defines file system routes relative to the source `routes` directory that should be static generated. Accepts wildcard behavior. This should not include the "base" pathname. If not provided, all routes will be static generated. `exclude` always takes priority over `include`.
[log?](./router.ssgrenderoptions.log.md) 'debug' _(Optional)_ Log level.
[maxTasksPerWorker?](./router.ssgrenderoptions.maxtasksperworker.md) number _(Optional)_ Maximum number of tasks to be running at one time per worker. Defaults to `20`.
[maxWorkers?](./router.ssgrenderoptions.maxworkers.md) number _(Optional)_ Maximum number of workers to use while generating the static pages. Defaults to the number of CPUs available.
[origin](./router.ssgrenderoptions.origin.md) string The URL `origin`, which is a combination of the scheme (protocol) and hostname (domain). For example, `https://qwik.dev` has the protocol `https://` and domain `qwik.dev`. However, the `origin` does not include a `pathname`. The `origin` is used to provide a full URL during Static Site Generation (SSG), and to simulate a complete URL rather than just the `pathname`. For example, in order to render a correct canonical tag URL or URLs within the `sitemap.xml`, the `origin` must be provided too. If the site also starts with a pathname other than `/`, please use the `basePathname` option in the Qwik Router config options.
[outDir](./router.ssgrenderoptions.outdir.md) string File system directory where the static files should be written.
[sitemapOutFile?](./router.ssgrenderoptions.sitemapoutfile.md) string \| null _(Optional)_ File system path to write the `sitemap.xml` to. Defaults to `sitemap.xml` and written to the root of the `outDir`. Setting to `null` will prevent the sitemap from being created.

members.name: StaticGenerateOptions
members.content:
```typescript export interface SsgOptions extends SsgRenderOptions ``` **Extends:** [SsgRenderOptions](#ssgrenderoptions)
Property Modifiers Type Description
[basePathname?](./router.staticgenerateoptions.basepathname.md) string _(Optional)_ Defaults to `/`
[qwikCityPlanModulePath?](./router.staticgenerateoptions.qwikcityplanmodulepath.md) string _(Optional)_
[qwikRouterConfigModulePath](./router.staticgenerateoptions.qwikrouterconfigmodulepath.md) string Path to the Qwik Router Config module exporting the default `@qwik-router-config`.
[renderModulePath](./router.staticgenerateoptions.rendermodulepath.md) string Path to the SSR module exporting the default render function. In most cases it'll be `./src/entry.ssr.tsx`.
[rootDir?](./router.staticgenerateoptions.rootdir.md) string _(Optional)_
[ssgEntryModulePath?](./router.staticgenerateoptions.ssgentrymodulepath.md) string _(Optional)_ Path to the auto-generated SSG entry module that can render a pathname. This is automatically generated by the vite adapter.

members.name: StaticGenerateResult
members.content:
```typescript export interface SsgResult ```
Property Modifiers Type Description
[duration](./router.staticgenerateresult.duration.md) number
[errors](./router.staticgenerateresult.errors.md) number
[rendered](./router.staticgenerateresult.rendered.md) number
[staticPaths](./router.staticgenerateresult.staticpaths.md) string\[\]
